item.title: About me
item.author: chahalinder0007.gmail.com (Inderjit Singh Chahal)
item.description: My name is Inderjit Singh Chahal. I have the following qualities: I rock a great mustache I’m extremely loyal to my family What else do you need? my history To be honest, I’m having some trouble remembering right now, so why don’t you just watch my movie and it will answer all your questions.
